title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter for Ollama; drop-in LLM & embeddings for chains, agents, RAG.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open WebUI); chat, PDF, RAG, user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, fluent builder, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed, tokio-based async client.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Go CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API with prompts library and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-chatbot (streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector, and Docker one-liner.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels or DMs; slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama in CI pipelines; pull models & generate text as steps.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package & service definition for Ollama; declarative model pulls.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin for local AI assistance using Ollama; summarize, rewrite, brainstorm.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama for scalable local inference.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama; small, zero-dependency HTTP wrapper.
